title: Australian reporter
brief_description: Magazine film comprising three items: Asian concert in Sydney at the Conservatorium of Music, Asian students present a concert in aid of the Royal Blind Society; Young farmers, this movement introduces boys and girls to the science (and chores) of modern farming; Radio Australia, this international station uses experts from overseas and well-stocked libraries to maintain world-wide appeal. No other credits available.
